name: netstreams-control-center
description: A user interface for the NetStreams library.

scripts.docker-up: npm run docker-up:infra && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml -p netstreams-control-center --project-directory . up -d --remove-orphans --build
scripts.docker-up:post-launch-config:create-user: cross-env-shell docker exec broker kafka-configs --zookeeper zookeeper:2181 --alter --add-config 'SCRAM-SHA-256=[password=broker],SCRAM-SHA-512=[password=broker]' --entity-type users --entity-name broker

cross-env-shell docker exec broker kafka-configs --zookeeper zookeeper:2181 --alter --add-config 'SCRAM-SHA-256=[password=connect-secret],SCRAM-SHA-512=[password=connect-secret]' --entity-type users --entity-name connect

cross-env-shell docker exec broker kafka-configs --zookeeper zookeeper:2181 --alter --add-config 'SCRAM-SHA-256=[password=schemaregistry-secret],SCRAM-SHA-512=[password=schemaregistry-secret]' --entity-type users --entity-name schemaregistry

cross-env-shell docker exec broker kafka-configs --zookeeper zookeeper:2181 --alter --add-config 'SCRAM-SHA-256=[password=ksqldb-secret],SCRAM-SHA-512=[password=ksqldb-secret]' --entity-type users --entity-name ksqldb

cross-env-shell docker exec broker kafka-configs --zookeeper zookeeper:2181 --alter --add-config 'SCRAM-SHA-256=[password=client-secret],SCRAM-SHA-512=[password=client-secret]' --entity-type users --entity-name client
scripts.docker-up:post-launch-config:create-tele: cross-env-shell docker exec broker kafka-topics --zookeeper zookeeper:2181 --create --topic netstreams.controlcenter.telemetry --partitions 10 --replication-factor 1

author: NetStream Contributors
